document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

No locality details, England , 11 males , 10 females , 1986, White leg. ( HRI )
.

Ecological notes : common in glasshouses and in house plant compost; also found in gardens; grassland at woodland fringe; found damaging cucumbers in pots [Cheshunt record, Edwards (1925a) ]; mushroom farm in old compost. Reared in laboratory culture. i–xii.
